mdRecord.dcterms:description: Criticizes "idle rumors." Says rations "enough to sustain life." Anticipates fighting. Says morale, condition of army good. Extended comments on religion: cause is right, God is just, willing to die if it is God's will.
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
